      • separateSourceId

        public static java.lang.String separateSourceId(java.lang.String entityId)
        if the input is sourceId::::entityId and the separator is :::: then return sourceId. If there is no separator configured, or none in entityId, then return the entityId
        Parameters:
        entityId -
        Returns:
        the sourceId
